General.Name: Hengli Petrochemical Co Ltd
General.Description: Hengli Petrochemical Co.,Ltd. engages in the production and sale of polyester-related materials in China. Its products include civilian polyester filaments, such as preoriented, draw texturing, and fully drawn yarns; industrial yarn; and polyester chips. The company was formerly known as Dalian Rubber and Plastic Machinery Co., Ltd and changed its name to Hengli Petrochemical Co.,Ltd. in May 2016. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Dalian, China.
General.Address: Building B, Victoria Plaza, Dalian, China
